questiontext.text:
Install the googlesheets4 package (install.packages("googlesheets4")).

There is a batch of googlesheets located here. Weâ€™re going to read in the greenhouse and then work out the mean of the values in the year column.

Use read_sheet(google_link, sheet = greenhouse) where google_link is *https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Jrr9I-GcGiusqkgRJQsQ3UFmsoXet3wsH3r1HQZZyms/edit?usp=sharing. Calculate the mean() of year in the usual way, including na.rm = TRUE in case there are missing values in the column.
